name: Time Survivors - Demo
description:
Hey there!

We are a team of three indie developers, long time friends, and we've been working full-time on a new game called Time Survivors. It's an action-packed roguelite bullet hell game, developed on Unreal Engine 5: we're huge fans of bullet hell rogue lite games, so we decided to make one ourselves. 

Write your ideas in the comments or join our Discord server! 


You can also wishlist on Steam if you're interested (that would immensely help us)

One more thing... curious to see who will be the first to beat the stage boss. Wondering if it is too difficult.

PS: the savegame of this standalone demo is not compatible with the Steam version; you can have both versions installed but the progresses will remain independent.
